1.py module¶

1.calculate_area(radius: float) → float¶

Calculate the area of a circle based on the provided radius.

Parameters:

radius (float) -- The radius of the circle.

Returns:

The area of the circle.

Return type:

float

Example

>>> calculate_area(5)
78.53981633974483
